title: The Engagement Update
changes: Enabled Push Notifications for Announcements, Quizzes, and Resources.
Added targeted Push Notifications for World Chat replies and Admin Gifts.
Introduced the 'Decision Journal' to the Elite Lounge.
Completed the 'Decision Journal' with Edit and Delete functionality.
Redesigned the header Inbox icon for a sleeker look.

title: Initial Release
changes: Welcome to MindMate! The all-in-one study platform is now live.
Core features include Focus Modes, To-Do lists, Community Hub, and more.
Gamified learning with credits, streaks, and a reward zone.
